title: Ramban on Genesis
versionTitle: Ramban (Nachmanides): Commentary on the Torah: Genesis by Rabbi Dr. Charles Chavel

Foreword: It would appear that the Torah "written with letters of black fire upon a background of white fire" was in the form we have mentioned, namely, that the writing was contiguous without break of words which made it possible to be read by way of Divine Names and also by way of normal reading which makes explicit  the Torah and the commandment.
